---
category: news
title: "Intel and Mila join forces for responsible artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "Intel yesterday announced a three-year strategic research and co-innovation collaboration with Mila, a Montreal-based artificial intelligence (AI) research institute. As part of this collaboration, more than 20 researchers from Intel and Mila will work on the development of advanced AI techniques to address global challenges such as climate change,"
